styles p: i was always told stand for something or fall for anything so i stand for what i believe in because if i dont then i will feel like a coward at the end of the day um i feel theres a point you as a man as a woman as a human being if you believe in something you gotta say what you believe in if youre passionate about it you should always stand up for it and thats what lifes about standing up for what you believe in thats why i push juice i push health i push peace even tough im a gangster rapper cuz thats what i believe in and thats what i stand for and whoever dont fuck with that i just fuck em cuz thats how i live stand for what you believe
